entry.title: GitHub Pages and Pelican
entry.summary: After re-purposing Trac's Wiki as the basis for my personal website http://rodrigo.senra.nom.br for more than 10 years, I dediced to migrate to a statically generated site hosted on Github Pages and using Pelican as the engine. It was a straightforward process, so I strongly recommend these â€¦
entry.content: After re-purposing Trac's Wiki as the basis for my personal website http://rodrigo.senra.nom.br for more than 10 years, I dediced to migrate to a statically generated site hosted on Github Pages and using Pelican as the engine. It was a straightforward process, so I strongly recommend these tools.
